notification.full.invalidReg$id: Registry "{0}" is invalid! Verify that the registry conforms with the specification and/or is compatible with the version of your Modern.
notification.full.offline: No internet connection! üîå Offline mode is active.
notification.full.regNotAvailOffline$id: Registry "{0}" is not available in offline mode! Verify that the registry is installed.
notification.full.regNotInRegs$id: Registry "{0}" must be added amongst registries before use! Verify that the registry is amongst registries.
notification.full.removeFailure$msg: Remove operation failed with the message "{0}"! Verify that the "data" directory is not in use by any other process.
notification.full.themeNotAvailOffline$i: Theme "{0}" is not available in offline mode! Verify that the theme is installed.
notification.full.themeNotAvailOfflineUn: Theme "{0}" was expected to be available in offline mode but it is not! Contact with Codemos.
notification.full.themeNotInReg$rid$tid: Registry "{0}" does not contain theme "{1}"! Verify that the theme is not removed and available in the registry.
notification.full.variantMismatch$id$var: Auxiliary theme "{0}" is not a "{1}" theme! Verify that Modern's variant matches with the auxiliary theme's.
notification.lead.cachingFailed$msg: Write operation failed with the message "{0}"! Verify that you have write permissions to the "cache" directory.
notification.lead.writingFailed$msg: Write operation failed with the message "{0}"! Verify that you have write permissions to the "themes" directory.
notification.msg.apiRateLimit: API rate limit exceeded! Use "Codemos Modern: Authenticate üîó" command to increase your limit.
notification.msg.authSessionNotFound: Authentication session not found! Contact with Microsoft.
notification.msg.contentNotFile$path: Content at path "{0}" is not a file! Contact with Codemos.
notification.msg.contentNotFound$path$id: Path "{0}" in repository "{1}" is not valid! Verify that path exists and is accessible.
notification.msg.networkError$status: Network error occurred with status code "{0}"! Contact with Codemos.
notification.msg.releaseNotFound$id: Latest release for "{0}" not found! Verify that repository has at least one release.
notification.msg.repoNotFound$id: Repository "{0}" not found! Verify that repository exists and is public.
notification.msg.unexpectedDummyData: Unexpected dummy data! Contact with Codemos.
notification.update.firstInstall: Welcome to the innovative theme suite/hub! üëã Start your journey by configuring Modern.
notification.update.majorUpdate: Modern is updated to V2! üéâ Check out what's new at our extension page.
notification.update.minorUpdate: Modern is updated! üéâ Introducing the flat design.
